verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Move a little closer,
Where the fire is burning,
Move a little closer,
Where God makes his man,
Fear not the burnings,
But yield unto them, for only the fire
Will purify this man.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pureness of motives, pureness of life;
Holiness in Jesus is God's design.
Fear not the testings, fear not the trials.
Only the fire will purify this man.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
God's holy city,
Coming down from above,
Clear as crystal
With the glory of God,
Fear not the testings, fear not the trials,
Only the fire will purify this man.
